nodes.title: SQL Server Express
nodes.summary: SQLServer Express edition is the entry-level, free database

product.summary: A open source object-relational database system
MySQL-a high reliable database management system
A scalable, high-performance, open source NoSQL database
SQLServer Express edition is the entry-level, free database

overview.overview: SQLServer Express Express edition is the entry-level, free database and is ideal for learning and building desktop and small server data-driven applications.

childMarkdownRemark.html: SQLServer Express edition is the entry-level, free database and is ideal for learning and building desktop and small server data-driven applications. It is the best choice for independent software vendors, developers, and hobbyists building client applications. If you need more advanced database features, SQL Server Express can be seamlessly upgraded to other higher end versions of SQL Server. SQL Server Express LocalDB, a lightweight version of Express that has all of its programmability features, yet runs in user mode, and has a fast, zero-configuration installation and a short list of prerequisites.
